assets.SubscriptionTexts.areYouSureIssue: Are you sure that you want to mint tokens?

assets.SubscriptionTexts.areYouSureSettl: Are you sure that you want to settle this order? It can take up to 5 minutes to settle.

assets.SubscriptionTexts.continueToDocSi: To sign the purchase agreement you will be redirected to DocuSign where you can electronically sign the agreement. assets.SubscriptionTexts.doYouApproveOrd: Are you sure you want to approve this order? By approving this order the Buyer will be granted access to ASI Global Index Class A and will be able to purchase on the primary market.
assets.SubscriptionTexts.doYOuApproveOrd: Are you sure you want to approve this order? By approving this order the buyer will be invited onto the platform and will be prompted to submitted their KYC information.

assets.SubscriptionTexts.noMaterialAdver: There has been no material adverse change in its business or financial condition since the most recent financial statements were delivered.

Once the issuer has confirmed receipt of payment, on the settlement date the tokens will be issued to your account.

assets.SubscriptionTexts.redirectToCBDCP: You will be redirected the Payment platform to complete payment.
assets.SubscriptionTexts.referenceCondit: You can reference the Conditions Precedent to the first drawdown on the
assets.SubscriptionTexts.requestPaymentM: Creating a hold reserves the tokens for this specific operation to ensure there will always be sufficient funds so the operation can be settled.
Set how long the tokens will be placed on hold. If the operation has not been completed within this timeframe the order will be cancelled.
assets.SubscriptionTexts.screenCaptureWi: A screen capture of your financial institution's wire transfer confirmation page
assets.SubscriptionTexts.settleConfirmDr: By proceeding the platform will settle the loan drawdown and the Borrower will receive stablecoins in its wallet.
assets.SubscriptionTexts.settleConfirmNo: By proceeding the platform will settle the loan novation and the Borrower will receive stablecoins in its wallet.
By proceeding the platform will settle the loan novation and the Lead Arranger will receive CBDC in its wallet.
assets.SubscriptionTexts.settleConfirmOr: Are you sure that you want to settle this order? It can take up to 5 minutes to settle.
assets.SubscriptionTexts.sureApproveDraw: Are you sure you want to approve this drawdown? By approving you the Borrower and Lead Arranger will be notified.
assets.SubscriptionTexts.sureApproveNova: Are you sure you want to approve this novation? By approving the Borrower and Incoming Lender will be notified.
assets.SubscriptionTexts.sureRejectDrawd: Are you sure that you want to reject this drawdown request?
assets.SubscriptionTexts.sureRejectNovat: Are you sure that you want to reject this novation request?
assets.SubscriptionTexts.sureToAcceptDra: By accepting this drawdown request, as the underwriter you shall fund the loan by the utilisation date.
assets.SubscriptionTexts.sureToAcceptNov: By accepting this novation request, as the Lender you shall fund the loan.
assets.SubscriptionTexts.sureToAcceptOrd: Are you sure you want to accept this order? By accepting this order you are agreeing that the order information is correct.
assets.SubscriptionTexts.sureToCancelOrd: Are you sure that you want to cancel this order? By doing this the issuer will receive a notification and refund any payment.
assets.SubscriptionTexts.toPayInitiateWi: To pay for this order, please initiate a wire transfer from your financial institution using the details below. Once you have completed the wire transfer, please upload a confirmation.

assets.SubscriptionTexts.uploadProofOfGo: Upload the proof of gold transfer to the Aurelium token holder deposit.
assets.SubscriptionTexts.whatHappensNext: The Facility Agent will review the proof that Conditions Precedent have been met. Upon approval you will be notified and will be able to drawdown from the loan.
